metadata.title: CVE-2021-39686 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In several functions of binder.c, there is a possible way to represent thewrong domain to SELinux due to a race condition. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-200688826References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
